ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Fairly easily and seemingly possible idea for this why not try networking....logging on but before actually playing the game while on news screen try replacing
ygData.messageBody:
Fairly easily and seemingly possible idea for this why not try
networking....logging on but before actually playing the game while on news
screen try replacing the files. That way you crack the file replace the
actual file right before logging on and wen their servers go to pull the
info bingo they pull the cracked file. Real quick real easy and you have a
super pumped character. Just use another computer to place the file. There
may be the possibility of "file in use" error messages but highly unlikely
as you wouldn't be logged on as of that time.

Just an idea
